ratings.comment: give me a 1.5/5 for the final performance feedback, and the only reason is I was absent the first class. Too much useless homework, like reflection papers and calling the students randomly in class. Thank you Mary, My first comments on this website, you deserve it.

Her teaching style left much to be desired. Despite being knowledgeable, she often struggled to communicate the material effectively, making it difficult to grasp key concepts. Lectures were disorganized and lacked clarity, which led to confusion among students. Overall, I wouldn't recommend this course to others.

Very unorganized and always had an attitude. Her grading is very unclear, and she doesn't even know what's on her own rubric. Says confusing things and never clarifies, it's like she's trying to convince herself that it's true. She always said one thing and then changes it again. Hated every second of her class.

First semester teaching Marketing 310 and she was all over the place. So unclear about everything and lectures were unhelpful for the semester project. The project was rushed and unorganized. She was also a D1 hater and didn't help when you had questions.
Not very clear about grading or project criteria. Always has an attitude and quick to get annoyed when answering questions.
Extremely subjective and overall disorganized. Can be impatient and unclear when answering questions.
